trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref>路由事件，以及相關附加事件和預覽事件。

trans-unit.source: This event data class is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> This event data class is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: 此事件資料類別搭配下列附加的事件:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>這個事件資料類別也會使用與基底項目上的下列路由事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>事件或<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>事件處理 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>設`true`事件資料中)，不會變更鍵盤焦點。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled, keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>事件或<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>事件處理、 鍵盤焦點不會變更。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件相關聯的邏輯鍵盤裝置。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: 輸入發生的時間。

trans-unit.source: The element that previously had focus.
trans-unit.target: 先前所擁有焦點的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that now has focus.
trans-unit.target: 項目現在具有焦點。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 特定類型的方式，可以增加事件系統的效率，叫用事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將泛型處理常式轉換為<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>然後再叫用它。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 若要以特定類型的方式呼叫泛型處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 要呼叫的處理常式上的目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that focus has moved to.
trans-unit.target: 取得焦點移至的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element with focus.
trans-unit.target: 具有焦點的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that previously had focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得先前擁有焦點的項目。

trans-unit.source: The previously focused element.
trans-unit.target: 先前已取得焦點的項目。
